text: Berbera (; , ) is the capital of the Sahil region of Somaliland. It is the main sea port of the country. Berbera is a coastal city and was the former capital of the British Somaliland protectorate before Hargeisa. It was a major port of the Ifat, Adal and Isaaq sultanates from the 13th to 19th centuries. ==References== Category:Cities in Somalia Category:Somaliland
title: Berbera
